blog.name: officialdistrict6co
blog.title: Official Dstrct6 Tumblr
blog.description:
Hi we are Dstrct6, we will be posting car, anime/manga, comic book and film news. We are also going to be posting cosplay and con highlights!

Like us on Facebook! Facebook.com/Dstrct6
Follow us on Instagram! @Dstrct6

Follow us on twitter! @Dstrct6Official 

Contact us: Dstrct6@gmail.com

We will be posting our own content which will have our watermark and/or logo. Feel free to reblog. Please leave the watermark/logo on. If you're in a picture please contact us to include your name and information.

blog.name: steverogersified
blog.title: Man Out of Time but Always in Fashion
blog.description: A blog to celebrate Steve Rogers - Captain America and over 75 years of comics (and film). Will mostly focus on comics but will include some MCU posts as well. And various other content which features Cap. This blogs supports multiple Steve Rogers ships and will not engage in or endorse shipwars or character bashing - it's meant to be a positive space.

summary: Ok so the Shazam trailer is literally just the opening for the Shazam story in the new 52 I’M ALL FOR IT HOLY SHIT IT TOOK THEM...
body:
Ok so the Shazam trailer is literally just the opening for the Shazam story in the new 52

I’M ALL FOR IT HOLY SHIT IT TOOK THEM FOREVER TO ADAPT IT INTO A MOVIE

I’M SO GLAD THEY’RE DOING IT :D

summary:
Shazam looks great, finally a good DC film!! I like this. 
What i dislike is immature fans on the comments of the trailer, “real...
caption:
Shazam looks great, finally a good DC film!! I like this.
What i dislike is immature fans on the comments of the trailer, “real captain marvel” “levi ←Larson" I like both studios, im glad this can succed but i disagree in how fans act./p>

reblog.comment:
Shazam looks great, finally a good DC film!! I like this.
What i dislike is immature fans on the comments of the trailer, “real captain marvel” “levi ←Larson" I like both studios, im glad this can succed but i disagree in how fans act./p>

trail.content_raw:
Shazam looks great, finally a good DC film!! I like this.
What i dislike is immature fans on the comments of the trailer, “real captain marvel” “levi ←Larson" I like both studios, im glad this can succed but i disagree in how fans act./p>
trail.content:
Shazam looks great, finally a good DC film!! I like this.
What i dislike is immature fans on the comments of the trailer, “real captain marvel” “levi ←Larson" I like both studios, im glad this can succed but i disagree in how fans act./p>

blog.name: robert-the-redhead-lover
blog.title:
Facts
trump feelings.
blog.description:
If you resort to attacking someone’s appearance,
you’ve already lost.  Government sucks at doing anything but perpetuating itself. Constituional absolutist. Proud American. Proud to be white, male & straight. Don't like it, raise your standards. Collectivism/identitarianism is moronic.

summary: Guys! The Captain Marvel* trailer is amazing! @lastsonlost @libertarirynn @jlongbone @omega-bellum @kaldicuct @nunyabizni...
caption:
Guys! The Captain Marvel* trailer is amazing!

@lastsonlost @libertarirynn @jlongbone @omega-bellum @kaldicuct @nunyabizni @gservator @thespectacularspider-girl


*I don’t care they renamed the comic or character to “Shazam” he’s always gonna be Captain Marvel to me.

tags: his name is captain marvel god darn it
summary: Shazam! - Trailer Nice to see an initial DC movie trailer that isn’t weighed down by airs of mythic weight and what not. This is...
caption:
Shazam! - Trailer

Nice to see an initial DC movie trailer that isn’t weighed down by airs of mythic weight and what not. This is a good trailer overall, it sells the concept - childhood becomes a god - get to meet a bit of the Marvel family and so on. Does exactly what an initial trailer should do.

reblog.comment:
Shazam! - Trailer

Nice to see an initial DC movie trailer that isn’t weighed down by airs of mythic weight and what not. This is a good trailer overall, it sells the concept - childhood becomes a god - get to meet a bit of the Marvel family and so on. Does exactly what an initial trailer should do.

trail.content_raw:
Shazam! - Trailer

Nice to see an initial DC movie trailer that isn’t weighed down by airs of mythic weight and what not. This is a good trailer overall, it sells the concept - childhood becomes a god - get to meet a bit of the Marvel family and so on. Does exactly what an initial trailer should do.
trail.content:

Nice to see an initial DC movie trailer that isn’t weighed down by airs of mythic weight and what not. This is a good trailer overall, it sells the concept - childhood becomes a god - get to meet a bit of the Marvel family and so on. Does exactly what an initial trailer should do.

blog.title: Media Junkie
blog.description: I have little to do with anything.

summary: Just saw the Shazam trailer
body:
Just saw the Shazam trailer

Someone: Hey, what’s your favorite DC movie?

Me: Shazam.

Someone: That’s not even out ye-

Me: Shazam!

Me: …

Me: Also Wonder Woman.

reblog.comment:

Me: Shazam.
